Posts.EditableText:
I wanted to let people know I have published this game. I am interested in any kind of positive feedback. I will listen to any negative feedback, as well. I just won't like it as much.  However, I do also need to know if something here or there is broken, so I can fix it. 
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/odwotgjlq0cyj6awt_mfia/other-worlds-near

Posts.EditableText:
The intro music might not play, or play late. The best thing to do is crawl back into bed after crawling out.
Also, I apologize to anyone who played during the first twelve hours, when, somehow, there were no sandals even after there should have been, which is fixed now, as is the speaking script which was earlier giving information for the third part of the game at the same time as the first because I work on it too late at night last. Sorry.
